app.appName: Adafruit BMP280 - Barometric Pressure & Altitude Sensor
app.desc:
The BMP280 is the successor of the BMP180. It is a high precision, low power digital environmental sensor providing temperature and barometric pressure readings.
Returned Values: Can measure barometric pressure with ±1 hPa accuracy, temperature with ±1.0°C accuracy, and altitude with ±1 meter accuracy.

Requires: Soldering 7 pin male header.
